slide.title: JSON
slide.example:
\n"; $str1 = "This is JSON"; echo json_encode($str1)."
\n"; $str2 = "하이퍼텍"; echo json_encode($str2)."
\n"; $arr1 = array(1,2,3); echo json_encode($arr1)."
\n"; $arr2 = array('numbers'=>$arr1, $str1, $str2); echo json_encode($arr2)."
\n"; $obj = new stdClass(); $obj->a = $arr1; echo json_encode($obj)."
\n"; ?>
